description: Information about how a cell is differentiated to a desired cell type or organoid.
title: Differentiation protocol
name: differentiation_protocol

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

method.description: Method applied to cell culture to induce a specific differentiation response.
method.comment: Consider making this an ontology in the future.

media.description: Culture media used to induce a specific differentiation response.
media.example: RPMI 1640 + B27; Neurobasal Media; StemPro-34 Serum-Free Medium

small_molecules.description: Small molecules added to stem cell medium to induce a specific differentiation response.
small_molecules.example: Retinoic Acid; CHIR99021 (GSK-inhibitor); Activin A; BMP4

target_cell_yield.description: Percent of target cells obtained after directed differentiation of origin cell.

reagents.description: A list of purchased reagents used in the differentiation protocol.

target_pathway.description: Targeted pathway for specific differentiation response.
target_pathway.comment: Consider making this an ontology in the future.

validation_method.description: Method used to validate origin cell successfully differentiated to target cell.
validation_method.example: Pancreatic Cell DTZ Detection Assay; qPCR; Flow Cytometry; Immunocytochemistry Staining

validation_result.description: Result confirming successful differentiation to target cell type.
validation_result.example: CD103 Positive; Nestin Positive; HCN4 Positive; CD11C Negative
